name: 利娅·克赖茨
introduction: Born in Los Angeles, Leah Kreitz was first seen on screen while her mother was pregnant with her on the family's annual Filipino holiday special: "The Gomez Family Singers." After living in sunny California, Leah's family moved to even sunnier Las Vegas. She graduated from the University of Nevada, Las Vegas with her Bachelor of Arts Degree in Stage & Screen Acting and moved to Brooklyn, where she currently resides with her husband Gabe Quiroga and their cat Cecilia.In addition to acting, Leah and her twin sister Dana Kreitz are developing projects under their production company Hapa Media. She is also a Resident Artist with New Light Theater Project. When not working, Leah can usually be found with her nose in a book, bent backwards in a yoga class, flying trapeze at TSNY, or hitting the slopes either upstate or back on the west coast.
